explains: adv. 故意地；任性固执地

sentences.en: May no fate willfully misunderstand me and half grant what I wish and snatch me away not to return.
sentences.cn: 但愿没有命运会故意误解我，只满足我一半的愿望，把我带走而不再回来。

sentences.en: Perhaps willfully, it may be easier to think about such lengthy timescales than about the more immediate future.
sentences.cn: 可能有人固执地认为，考虑如此长的时间跨度可能比考虑即将到来的未来更容易。

sentences.en: And like many techy terms, it is willfully misspelled.
sentences.cn: 和一些科技术语一样，这个词是故意拼错的。
